Class ClientAuthenticationHandler

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthenticationHandler

    public class ClientAuthenticationHandler
extends AbstractClientAuthenticationHandler
    Specialized handler which builds the authenticated user directly from the retrieved user profile.
    Since:
    3.5.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu
